Expressive Testing:

Code Generation:
https://carbon.now.sh/?bg=rgba(235,235,235,0)&t=material&wt=sharp&l=yaml&ds=false&dsyoff=20px&dsblur=68px&wc=false&wa=true&pv=0px&ph=0px&ln=false&fm=Fira%20Code&fs=14px&si=false&code=---%250Anamespace%253A%2520ModellingWith%255CEventSauce%250A%250Acommands%253A%250A%2520%2520StartsUsingEventSauce%253A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520fields%253A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520id%253A%2520developerId%250A%250Aevents%253A%250A%2520%2520UsingEventSauceWasVeryEffective%253A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520fields%253A%2520%255B%255D%250A%2520%2520DeveloperAcquiredNewSkill%253A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520fields%253A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520acquiredSkill%253A%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520type%253A%2520AcquiredSkill%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520%2520example%253A%2520EVENT_SOURCING%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520&es=2x&wm=false

Event Cards:
https://carbon.now.sh/?bg=rgba(235,235,235,0)&t=material&wt=sharp&l=application/json&ds=false&dsyoff=20px&dsblur=68px&wc=false&wa=true&pv=0px&ph=0px&ln=false&fm=Fira%20Code&fs=18px&si=false&code=%257B%250A%2520%2520%2522headers%2522%253A%2520%257B%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2522id%2522%253A%2520%25222a909d94-52b0-4bef-8cb1-e4150eeb1924%2522%252C%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2522time_of_recording%2522%253A%2520%25222018-01-01%252012%253A00%253A00.000000%2522%252C%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2522type%2522%253A%2520%2522eventsauce.developer_started%250A%2520%2520%257D%252C%250A%2520%2520%2522body%2522%253A%2520%257B%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2522reason_1%2522%253A%2520%2522I%2520wanted%2520more%2520fine-grained%2520control.%2522%252C%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2522reason_2%2522%253A%2520%2522I%2520like%2520expressive%2520test%2520tooling.%2522%252C%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520%2522reason_3%2522%253A%2520%2522I%2520like%2520to%2520have%2520control%2520over%2520my%2520tools.%2522%250A%2520%2520%257D%250A%257D&es=4x&wm=false
